mapper.select: select no, title, id, viewCount, boardPosition, name, position, regDate, accept, rn from (select c.*, rownum as rn from(SELECT b.no, b.title, m.ID, b.VIEW_COUNT as viewCount, b.POSITION as boardPosition, b.GROUP_NO, m.name, m.position, to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, b.accept FROM board b, member m WHERE b.member_no=m.no and (b.title like '%' || #{borKwd} || '%') ORDER BY b.GROUP_NO desc, boardPosition asc, b.no desc) c) where (#{borPage}-1)*10+1 <= rn and rn <= #{borPage}*10

select no, title, id, viewCount, boardPosition, name, position, regDate, accept, rn from (select c.*, rownum as rn from(SELECT b.no, b.title, m.ID, b.VIEW_COUNT as viewCount, b.POSITION as boardPosition, b.GROUP_NO, m.name, m.position, to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, b.accept FROM board b, member m WHERE b.member_no=m.no ORDER BY b.GROUP_NO desc, boardPosition asc, b.no desc) c) where (#{borPage}-1)*10+1 <= rn and rn <= #{borPage}*10
select count(*) from board where title like '%' || #{borKwd} || '%'
select no, title, content, group_no as groupNo, position, accept from board where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board VALUES (seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, seq_boardgroup.nextval, 1, 0, #{memberNo})
mapper.update: update board set accept = '1' where no=#{no}
update board set view_count = (view_count)+1 where no=#{no}
